## Websites

- A website can be used to publish a group of `.qmd` documents togehter
- A website is a project and contains a configuration file `_quarto.yml`

## The configuration file

``` yaml
project:
  type: website

website:
  title: "mysite"
  navbar:
    background: primary
    left:
      - href: index.qmd
        text: Home
      - about.qmd

format:
  html:
    theme: cosmo
    css: styles.css
    toc: true
```
